name: Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania
summary:
Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania is a new match 3 game with talking cat Emma as the main character, who will guide you through the levels and watch you make progress. If you are a fan of fruit splash games, you will certainly have fun with this one. Download Emma the Cat: Fruit Mania matching game and enjoy this fruit blast adventure!
There hardly is a person who once wasn't addicted to a certain match 3 game.
